page.title: 14Games Children Play
page.content: Our school has approximately two-hundred pupils. Sixty-four children agreed{"Piggy Backs"}was their favourite game. This game is played by selecting one leader to stand at the frount of two children acting as piggies and two riders to mount the piggies. One must complete a race without falling off to win. The second most popular game was{football} and{skipping. "1 2 3 Dunya"}is the third most popular game in our school. One person is chosen to be "on" and discover where everyone is hidden. Players must return to a pre-arranged spot, shouting "1 2 3 Dunya" before they are discovered. During indoor playtimes and at home time children play{card games,chess, hangman, } {scrabble}and{computer games.}Other popular games in our school are{tick, {swopping,dungeons,war}and{red rover.}
